Big Shed Audio-Docs
Welcome to Big Shed
Big Shed is your podcasting home for good voices, good stories, and good sound from independent producers, podcasters and audio artists.
What do you think about Big Shed? We'd love to hear from you. And please, let us know if you're interested in submitting work.
If you want more info, visit Big Shed on MySpace.
Your loving curators, Shea Shackelford and Jennifer Deer
